channel.title: [PI]Skillcape Help[PI]
channel.description:
Alright, here is my issue.
I have added skillcapes correctly to my server, got the skillcape emote button working but when I preform the emote, it turns out being ice barrage instead.
Then after looking for correct animations and gfx's, unsuccessful.
Then I realized that I had to add the correct animations and gfx's to the client. Found a few tutorials but nothing.
If there is a tutorial I am unaware of or if you can help me yourself, I would appreciate it if you can provide me with what I need. :)
EDIT: Lol, guess when it comes to skillcapes, nobody knows. XD

item.title: [PI]Skillcape Help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Alright, here is my issue.

I have added skillcapes correctly to my server, got the skillcape emote button working but when I preform the emote, it turns out being ice barrage instead.

Then after looking for correct animations and gfx’s, unsuccessful.

Then I realized that I had to add the correct animations and gfx’s to the client. Found a few tutorials but nothing.

If there is a tutorial I am unaware of or if you can help me yourself, I would appreciate it if you can provide me with what I need.

EDIT:
Lol, guess when it comes to skillcapes, nobody knows. XD
